attributes.review:
When i opened the app a bunch of pigeons popped up on the screen! I have PTSD from pigeons!! this is obviously the oranges fault! Couldn’t he have at least thought about people with PPTSD????!! (pigeon ptsd) Also, the app made pigeons noises and made a bunch of pigeons swarm my grandma to death!👺 This app is the reason my grandma died and the company should be sued! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS TERRIBLE, DISGUSTING, BAD, HORRIBLE, HORRENDOUS, AND RUDE!!!!!!!!!! and lastly,,,, OBAMA 2020!

🍊= 🤡.        Obama =✨✨🤩🤩💅.
attributes.title: This app is very bad

attributes.review: This app committed fraud! It hacked into my phone and changed my screen savers to pictures of beans! Then my flashlight kept going on and off and I couldn’t do anything but try and delete the app. When I tried to delete the app speeches of trump started playing and that mixed with the flashing light caused epilepsy. I do not recommend this app and it is very dangerous!
attributes.title: Caused epilepsy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that i can get insightful info about our racist, misogynistic, sexist, homophobic, disgusting president! Turns out it hacked my phone and all it was showing me was lil old donnies nudes. I had to get a mew phone and also had to wash my eyes out with bleach. Absolutely disgusting and who knew that dicks could actually be that small. I feel so bad for melania😝🤪💅💕🥰✨🤢🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: This app is truly a waste of space and storage. As soon as I opened the app I was struck with so much ignorance and stupidity that I lost half of my brain and sight in my left eye. As I kept on reading I began to realize that my brain cells began dying. I am now in the hospital because of this app. Absolutely terrible how the president is killing his own citizens.
attributes.title: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded

attributes.review: If im being honest I recently became a trump supporter, so i downloaded this app so i could look for merch or rally’s and such. But considering how badly this app was built and how long it took to download during those couple hours it took, i looked more into trump and found out how bad of a person he is. We’ve never had a good president ever. i was counting on you trump.
attributes.title: I’m dissatisfied

attributes.review: This app slowed my phone down and even closed me out a few times, there was misinformation and even had false advertising, in order to keep something great it has to be great to begin with 🤷🏼‍♀️ , overall I wouldn’t recommend made my phone glitch out and it was a total waste of time to even open it
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.userName: I should be Katara from ATLA
attributes.review:
When I opened the app store, I expected great things from this app because, of course, our President is great. Oh boy was I in for a surprise! When I opened the app for the first time my dog started to freak out!! With my enormous amount of knowledge, I concluded that my dog isn’t a Donald Trump fan. I assume he was horrified by me downloading the app. When I looked over I saw betrayal in his eyes. Next thing I know he ran out the front door. I never saw him again, the only thing I have left is his collar...

🐸😭🦷❌👁🦷👏🎊🙋🏽‍♀️🇸🇻😌🦷✊🙏😵🚓👁👄👁👀

“See this necklace? It was my mom’s before she died in a Fire Nation raid...”
           -Katara, Avatar: The Last Airbender
attributes.title: My dog is dead

attributes.review: I got on this app to see what Mr. Cheeto had to offer and I was greeted with a series of threatening messages on the app telling me what will happy if I dont vote for Mr. Cheeto. This app also began to run 24/7 in the background tracking my conversations and everything I did on my phone. I feel me and many other people are in danger by having this terrible app on the store. I am scared for my safety
attributes.title: I WAS THREATENED AND WATCHED

attributes.review: This app did not work and made my phone glitch out many times, when i tried to do anything my phone kept glitching out of the app itself and because i have the iphone 11 i don’t think it should be doing that. this app is a complete waste of time and i do not recommend buying it
attributes.title: Do not download!!

attributes.review: this app crashed several times and made my phone turn off for 2 minutes. i turned it back on and the battery was HOT and my phone was overheating. i have no idea what this app does to your phone but (1) i can’t open it and (2) it made my phone overheat. this app doesn’t work.
attributes.title: absolutely horrible. do not download
